item.title: Meta 首次推出新一代人工智能芯片
item.description: Meta Platforms 周三公布了该公司下一代内部人工智能加速芯片的详细信息。【原文：Meta Platforms unveiled details on Wednesday about the next generation of the company's in-house artificial intelligence accelerator chip.】

item.title: 优步加强乘客安全功能
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）周三表示，该公司正在增强其针对全球乘客的安全功能，以最大限度地降低风险并确保夜间女性的安全。【原文：Uber Technologies said on Wednesday that it is boosting its safety features for passengers around the world, as it looks to minimize risk and ensure security for women at night.】

item.title: 美国国家运输安全委员会（NTSB）就 737 MAX 9 登机门插头调查与波音公司进行新的面谈
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会本周将对波音公司和联邦航空管理局人员进行新一轮访谈，以调查 1 月 5 日阿拉斯加航空公司 737 MAX 9 中空紧急事件。【原文：The National Transportation Safety Board is conducting a new round of interviews with Boeing and Federal Aviation Administration personnel this week in its probe into the Jan. 5 Alaska Airlines 737 MAX 9 mid-air emergency.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份批发库存强劲增长
item.description: 2 月份美国批发库存稳健反弹，表明库存可能会促进第一季度的经济增长。【原文：U.S. wholesale inventories rebounded solidly in February, suggesting that inventories could contribute to economic growth in the first quarter.】

item.title: 政府公告：美国限制与俄罗斯、中国和阿联酋的 11 家实体开展贸易
item.description: 美国商务部周三将俄罗斯、中国和阿拉伯联合酋长国的11家实体列入政府出口管制名单，原因是这些实体违反了与制裁伊朗、乌克兰战争和袭击中东油轮有关的规定。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department added 11 entities from Russia, China and the United Arab Emirates on Wednesday to a government export control list for violations pertaining to Iran sanctions, the war in Ukraine and attacks on oil tankers in the Middle East, according to a federal government posting.】

item.title: 微策略公司引领加密货币领域空头损失，3 月以来损失 20 亿美元
item.description: 根据 S3 Partners 的数据，自 3 月份以来，押注微策略的卖空者已经损失了 19.2 亿美元，这凸显了该股涨势所带来的打击，该股的表现超过了比特币。【原文：Short sellers betting against MicroStrategy have lost $1.92 billion since March, according to data from S3 Partners, highlighting the hit from a rally that has helped the stock outperform bitcoin .】

item.title: 越南命令 Netflix 停止宣传和分发其游戏
item.description: 越南广播管理局周四表示，由于美国流媒体平台 Netflix 公司尚未获得游戏服务许可证，越南已下令 Netflix 公司在 4 月 25 日之前停止在该国投放广告和发行游戏。【原文：Vietnam has ordered Netflix Inc to stop advertising and distributing its games in the country before April 25 as the U.S. streaming platform has not yet been granted a license for games services, its broadcasting authority said on Thursday.】

item.title: 标普将房地产巨头中国万科的信用评级降至垃圾级
item.description: 周三，受重创的中国房地产业又传来坏消息，S&P Global 成为最后一家剥夺中国万科投资级地位的主要信用评级公司。【原文：There was more bad news for the battered Chinese property sector on Wednesday, as S&P Global became the last of the major credit rating firms to strip China Vanke , of its investment grade status.】

item.title: 美联储被认为要等到九月才会降息
item.description: 周三，在一份政府报告显示上月通胀连续第三个月强于预期后，交易商押注美联储将等到9月才开始降息。 报告显示，3月份核心消费者价格指数比2月份上升0.4%，比去年同期上升3.8%。【原文：The Federal Reserve will wait until September before starting to cut interest rates, traders bet on Wednesday, after a government report showed inflation was stronger than expected last month for a third month in a row. U.S. short-term interest-rate futures plunged after the report, which showed the core consumer price index rose 0.4% in March from February and was up 3.8% from a year earlier.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）警告称，产业政策不是解决经济增长缓慢问题的灵丹妙药
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周三表示，美国、欧洲和其他国家最近为引导某些行业的创新而采取的产业政策举措并不是促进经济增长的灵丹妙药。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Wednesday said recent industrial policy initiatives pursued by the United States, Europe and other countries to steer innovation in certain sectors were no panacea to boost economic growth.】

item.title: 牛市让散户交易员敢于冒险下注
item.description: 随着人工智能鼻祖英伟达（Nvidia）股价的反弹以及对宽松货币政策的押注将美国股市推向创纪录的水平，散户交易商在挽回了过去两年的全部损失后，开始大举进行高风险押注。【原文：Retail traders are piling into risky bets after recouping all the losses made in the last two years as a rally in AI poster child Nvidia's shares and bets on easing monetary policy pushed U.S. stocks to record levels.】

item.title: 世贸组织称，全球贸易在 2023 年出现罕见下滑后将稳步恢复
item.description: 世界贸易组织（World Trade Organization）周三表示，全球货物贸易将在今年出现反弹，但反弹速度将低于此前的预期。【原文：Global goods trade should rebound this year, but more slowly than previously expected, after only its third decline in 30 years in 2023, the World Trade Organization said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国会计监管机构因考试作弊向荷兰毕马威会计师事务所索赔 2500 万美元 - 主席
item.description: 美国会计监管机构周三表示，已对荷兰毕马威会计师事务所（KPMG）处以 2500 万美元的民事罚款，原因是该公司违反了与普遍考试作弊有关的会计和质量控制规定。【原文：The U.S. accounting watchdog on Wednesday said it has hit KPMG Netherlands with a $25 million civil penalty for violations of accounting and quality control rules related to widespread exam cheating.】

item.title: 美国 3 月意外 CPI 或令美联储暂缓 6 月减息计划
item.description: 由于汽油和住房成本上升，3月份美国消费者物价涨幅超过预期，这使人们进一步怀疑美联储是否会在6月份开始降息。【原文：U.S. consumer prices increased more than expected in March amid rises in the costs of gasoline and shelter, casting further doubt on whether the Federal Reserve will start cutting interest rates in June.】

item.title: 高盛将中国 2024 年经济增长预期上调至 5.0
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）投资银行周三在一份报告中称，已将今年中国经济同比增长预期从去年11月的4.8%上调至5.0%。【原文：Goldman Sachs has raised its forecast for China's year-on-year economic growth this year to 5.0% from 4.8% in November last year, the investment bank said in a note on Wednesday.】

item.title: 梅西百货任命两名新董事；结束与 Arkhouse 的代理权争夺战
item.description: 梅西百货公司（Macy's）周三任命了两名新的独立董事进入董事会，立即生效，结束了与激进投资者 Arkhouse Management 的代理权争夺。【原文：Macy's on Wednesday named two new independent directors to its board effective immediately, ending a proxy contest with activist investor Arkhouse Management.】

item.title: 美国 3 月份消费者价格涨幅高于预期
item.description: 由于汽油和住房成本上升，3月份美国消费者物价涨幅超过预期，这使人们进一步怀疑美联储是否会在6月份开始降息。【原文：U.S. consumer prices increased more than expected in March amid rises in the costs of gasoline and shelter, casting further doubt on whether the Federal Reserve will start cutting interest rates in June.】

item.title: Stellantis 首席执行官表示，将延长内燃机菲亚特熊猫城市汽车的生产至 2030 年
item.description: Stellantis 公司首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）周三表示，该公司将把其最畅销的菲亚特熊猫（Fiat Panda）城市汽油车的生产期延长至 2030 年，以期为客户带来经济实惠。【原文：Stellantis Chief Executive Carlos Tavares said on Wednesday the automaker would extend the production of its best-selling Fiat Panda petrol city car to 2030, in a bid to bring affordability to clients.】

item.title: 飞机需求强劲，空中客车股东召开会议
item.description: 空中客车公司周三开始举行年度股东大会，尽管竞争对手波音公司最近正努力应对一系列危机，但空中客车公司仍面临着 "供应链挑战"。【原文：Airbus began an annual shareholders meeting on Wednesday basking in strong demand as rival Boeing grapples with a slew of recent crises, but facing "supply chain challenges".】

item.title: 欧盟监管机构称加密货币交易集中度 "相当令人担忧
item.description: 欧盟证券监管机构周三表示，加密货币交易高度集中，仅 Binance 一家就占了市场的一半以上，这让人担心一旦出现故障或失灵会对该行业造成影响。【原文：The high level of concentration in crypto trading, with Binance alone accounting for more than half the market, raises concerns about the impact a failure or malfunction would have on the sector, the EU's securities watchdog said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷银行倒闭后，瑞士计划提高银行安全性
item.description: 瑞士周三提出了针对瑞银集团和其他三家系统性相关银行的建议，旨在保护该国避免重蹈去年瑞士信贷银行倒闭的覆辙。【原文：Switzerland put forward on Wednesday proposals for UBS and three other systemically relevant banks aimed at protecting the country from a repeat of last year's Credit Suisse collapse.】

item.title: 瑞银在瑞士应对瑞士信贷救援时将面临更严格的规定
item.description: 瑞士政府周三表示，在瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）获救一年后，瑞银和其他三家系统性相关银行必须面对更严格的资本要求，以保护瑞士更广泛的经济。【原文：Switzerland's government said on Wednesday that UBS and three other systemically relevant banks must face tougher capital requirements to shield the country's wider economy, a year after the rescue of Credit Suisse.】

item.title: 企业为供应链排放抵消开绿灯
item.description: 一家企业气候行动计划的主要评判机构表示，尽管人们担心碳排放可能会增加，但该机构仍将允许企业使用碳信用额来抵消其供应链污染，此举将使抵消需求增长。【原文：A leading judge of corporate climate action plans said it will allow companies to use carbon credits to offset their supply chain pollution despite concerns it could see emissions rise, a move that should see demand for offsets grow.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称，如果不进行生产力改革，世界将面临持续低增长
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）周三表示，除非进行重大改革以提高生产力和利用人工智能等技术，否则到2030年全球经济增长率将仅达到2.8%，比历史平均水平低整整一个百分点。【原文：Global economic growth will reach just 2.8% by 2030, a full percentage point below the historical average, unless major reforms are made to boost productivity and leverage technologies such as artificial intelligence, the IMF said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧盟将针对中国扭曲行为的贸易指南扩展至新领域
item.description: 欧盟委员会更新了其关于中国经济中由国家主导的扭曲现象的报告，增加了新的行业，并可能为欧盟芯片和清洁技术生产商的反倾销投诉敞开大门。【原文：The European Commission has updated its report on state-led distortions in the Chinese economy, adding new sectors and potentially opening the door to anti-dumping complaints from EU chip and clean-tech producers.】

item.title: 德国 Galeria 公司出售给美国投资者 Baker 和 Beetz 财团
item.description: 德国零售商 Galeria Karstadt Kaufhof 周三表示，将由美国投资者理查德-贝克（Richard Baker）和德国商人贝恩德-贝茨（Bernd Beetz）组成的财团接管。【原文：Germany's Galeria Karstadt Kaufhof is to be taken over by a consortium of U.S. investor Richard Baker and German businessman Bernd Beetz, the retailer said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 达美航空看好创纪录的旅行需求前景
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）因旅游需求旺盛，第一季度盈利超过华尔街预期，该公司周三对本季度业绩作出乐观展望。【原文：Delta Air Lines on Wednesday offered an upbeat outlook for the current quarter after its first-quarter earnings topped Wall Street estimates on buoyant travel demand.】

item.title: 美国银行利润下滑，关注点转向利息收入前景
item.description: 随着美国银行业巨头准备公布略低的第一季度利润，投资者将重点关注高管们预计今年利息支出将增加多少收入。【原文：As U.S. banking giants prepare to report slightly lower first-quarter profits, investors will focus on how much more income executives expect from interest payments this year.】

item.title: 泰国央行维持关键利率不变，无视政府要求降息的呼吁
item.description: 泰国央行周三连续第三次会议维持关键利率不变，抵制了政府一再发出的降低借贷成本以帮助振兴东南亚第二大经济体的呼吁。【原文：Thailand's central bank left its key interest rate unchanged for a third straight meeting on Wednesday, resisting repeated calls by the government to lower borrowing costs to help revive Southeast Asia's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 经济萎靡不振，欧洲企业纷纷裁员
item.description: 数十年来最高的通货膨胀率和乌克兰战争的影响迫使欧洲各地的公司裁员或冻结招聘。【原文：The highest inflation for decades and the impact of the war in Ukraine have forced companies across Europe into layoffs or hiring freezes.】
